ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.description: Amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowa.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Related Allowance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowa.description: Amount of allowance for credit losses related to recorded investment.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelated.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with No Related Allowance, Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithNoRelated.description: Amount of investment in impaired financing receivables for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.description: Amount of investment in impaired financing receivables for which there is a related allowance for credit losses.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

IncomeTaxCreditsAndAdjustments.label: Income Tax Credits and Adjustments
IncomeTaxCreditsAndAdjustments.description: A credit or adjustment for government or taxing authority authorized decrease in taxes owed as a result of meeting certain tax policy conditions.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations, Adjustment of Deferred Tax (Asset) Liability
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from continuing operations attributable to an adjustment of a deferred tax liability or asset for enacted changes in tax laws or rates or a change in the tax status of the entity.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

IncomeTaxesReceivable.label: Income Taxes Receivable, Current
IncomeTaxesReceivable.description: Carrying amount due within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible expenses.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax expense (benefit).

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxExemptIncome.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Exempt Income, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxExemptIncome.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPaya.label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPaya.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount due for taxes based on the reporting entity's earnings or attributable to the entity's income earning process (business presence) within a given jurisdiction.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Interest Receivable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

IncreaseDecreaseInAdvancePaymentsByBorro.label: Increase (Decrease) in Advance Payments by Borrowers for Taxes and Insurance
IncreaseDecreaseInAdvancePaymentsByBorro.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepayments received from borrowers for taxes and insurance remitted to the appropriate tax authority or insurer on behalf of the borrower.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredIncomeTaxes.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Income Taxes
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredIncomeTaxes.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the account that represents the temporary difference that results from Income or Loss that is recognized for accounting purposes but not for tax purposes and vice versa.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInDeposits.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period deposits balances.

IncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxesReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxesReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in income taxes receivable, which represents the amount due from tax authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet.label: Increase (Decrease) in Interest Payable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in interest payable, which represents the amount owed to note holders, bond holders, and other parties for interest earned on loans or credit extended to the reporting entity.

IncreaseDecreaseInLoansHeldForSale.label: Increase (Decrease) in Loans Held-for-sale
IncreaseDecreaseInLoansHeldForSale.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of loans or securitized loans that are held with the intention to sell in the near future.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

InformationTechnologyAndDataProcessing.label: Information Technology and Data Processing
InformationTechnologyAndDataProcessing.description: The amount of expenses incurred in the period for information technology and data processing products and services.

IntangibleAssetsNetIncludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Including Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsNetIncludingGoodwill.description: Carrying amount of finite-lived intangible assets, indefinite-lived intangible assets and goodwill. Goodwill is an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized. Intangible assets are assets, not including financial assets, lacking physical substance.

InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.label: Interest and Dividend Income, Operating
InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.description: Represents the total of interest and dividend income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, earned from (1) loans and leases whether held-for-sale or held-in-portfolio; (2) investment securities; (3) federal funds sold; (4) securities purchased under agreements to resell; (5) investments in banker's acceptances, commercial paper, or certificates of deposit; (6) dividend income; or (7) other investments not otherwise specified herein.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeasesHeldFo.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases Held-for-sale
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeasesHeldFo.description: The amount of interest and fee income earned from loans held-for-sale, including mortgage loans, and interest earned from direct financing and sales-type leases held-for-sale.

InterestBearingDepositLiabilities.label: Interest-bearing Deposit Liabilities
InterestBearingDepositLiabilities.description: The aggregate of all domestic and foreign interest-bearing deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesDomesti.label: Interest-bearing Deposit Liabilities, Domestic
InterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesDomesti.description: Total amount of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities, which may include brokered, retail, demand, checking, notice of withdrawal, money market and other interest-bearing deposits.

InterestBearingDepositsInBanks.label: Interest-bearing Deposits in Banks and Other Financial Institutions
InterestBearingDepositsInBanks.description: For banks and other depository institutions (including Federal Reserve Banks, if applicable): Interest-bearing deposits in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits, which are presented separately from cash on the balance sheet.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositCertificat.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Certificates of Deposits
InterestBearingDomesticDepositCertificat.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic certificate of deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositChecking.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Checking
InterestBearingDomesticDepositChecking.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic checking deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositMoneyMarke.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Money Market
InterestBearingDomesticDepositMoneyMarke.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositNegotiable.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW)
InterestBearingDomesticDepositNegotiable.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) demand deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositSavings.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Savings
InterestBearingDomesticDepositSavings.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic savings deposit liabilities. Saving deposits bear interest and have no stated maturity.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositTimeDeposi.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Time Deposits
InterestBearingDomesticDepositTimeDeposi.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic time deposits. Time deposits bear interest for a fixed, stated period of time and include certificate of deposits and individual retirement accounts.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestExpenseBorrowings.label: Interest Expense, Borrowings
InterestExpenseBorrowings.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all borrowings.

InterestExpenseDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Deposits
InterestExpenseDeposits.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all deposits.

InterestIncomeDepositsWithFinancialInsti.label: Interest Income, Deposits with Financial Institutions
InterestIncomeDepositsWithFinancialInsti.description: Interest income derived from funds deposited with both domestic and foreign financial institutions including funds in money market and other accounts.

InterestIncomeDomesticDeposits.label: Interest Income, Domestic Deposits
InterestIncomeDomesticDeposits.description: Interest earned on deposits in United States money market accounts and other United States interest earning accounts.

InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.label: Interest Income (Expense), after Provision for Loan Loss
InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.description: Amount of interest income or expense, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, including consideration of the provisions for loan, lease, credit, and other related losses.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InterestIncomeSecuritiesMortgageBacked.label: Interest Income, Securities, Mortgage Backed
InterestIncomeSecuritiesMortgageBacked.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securitized, pass-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans.

InterestIncomeSecuritiesOtherUSGovernmen.label: Interest Income, Securities, Other US Government
InterestIncomeSecuritiesOtherUSGovernmen.description: Interest income on securities issued by US government agencies not including US Treasury Securities.

InterestIncomeSecuritiesStateAndMunicipa.label: Interest Income, Securities, State and Municipal
InterestIncomeSecuritiesStateAndMunicipa.description: Interest income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, derived from debt securities issued by municipal governments, local taxing districts and US state government agencies.

InterestIncomeSecuritiesUSTreasuryAndOth.label: Interest Income, Securities, US Treasury and Other US Government
InterestIncomeSecuritiesUSTreasuryAndOth.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on U.S. Treasury securities and other U.S. government securities.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

LaborAndRelatedExpense.label: Labor and Related Expense
LaborAndRelatedExpense.description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit.

LeaseAndRentalExpense.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense
LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LineOfCredit.label: Long-term Line of Credit
LineOfCredit.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowanceCovered.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance, Covered
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowanceCovered.description: Amount of allowance for loan and lease losses covered by loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercial.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Commercial (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercial.description: Amount before allowance of commercial loans and leases receivable includes, but not limited to, commercial and industrial loans, agricultural loans, mortgage loans, promissory notes, interbank and other loans to financial institutions, draws against credit facilities, trade financing, lease financings. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumer.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumer.description: Amount before allowance of consumer loans, including, but not limited to, mortgage, home equity, vehicles, credit card, installment, and lease financing. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerConstruc.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Construction (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerConstruc.description: Amount before allowance of loans issued to build, improve or remodel a residential home. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerHomeEqui.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Home Equity (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerHomeEqui.description: Amount before allowance of revolving, open-end loan, extended under a line of credit and secured by the borrower's residential property. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerRealEsta.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Real Estate (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerRealEsta.description: Amount before allowance of consumer real estate loans. Includes, but not limited to, construction financing, residential mortgage loans, and home equity lines of credit. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross
LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.description: Amount before allowance of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedCommitme.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Commitment to Lend
LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedCommitme.description: Amount of unfunded portion of contractual agreement to lend funds to borrower for financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedNonperfo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Nonperforming, Nonaccrual of Interest
LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedNonperfo.description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans deemed to be questionable as to collection on which no interest is continuing to be recognized.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredInc.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net of Deferred Income
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredInc.description: Amount before allowance and after deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, reflects the carrying amount of unpaid loan amounts due from related parties at the balance sheet date.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesAd.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Additions
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesAd.description: Reflects the amount of new advances made to related parties in the form of loan and lease receivables.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesCo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Collections (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesCo.description: Reflects the amount of collections received from related parties to reduce the carrying amounts of loans and leases receivable due from them.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesPr.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Proceeds
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesPr.description: Amount of cash inflow from related parties which reduce the amount of loans and leases receivable due from related parties.

LoansPledgedAsCollateral.label: Loans Pledged as Collateral
LoansPledgedAsCollateral.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loans that have been pledged as collateral for borrowings. If the secured party has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge the collateral, then the debtor reclassifies that asset and report that asset in its statement of financial position separately from other assets not so encumbered.

LoansReceivableCommercialConstruction.label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Construction (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansReceivableCommercialConstruction.description: Amount before allowance of commercial construction loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansReceivableCommercialRealEstate.label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Real Estate (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansReceivableCommercialRealEstate.description: Amount before allowance of commercial loans issued to businesses to acquire, develop, construct, improve, or refinance land or building. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansReceivableHeldForSaleAmount.label: Financing Receivable, Held-for-Sale
LoansReceivableHeldForSaleAmount.description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of financing receivable classified as held-for-sale.

LoansReceivableNet.label: Loans Receivable, Net (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansReceivableNet.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes loans held for sale. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Loss on Sale of Investments
LossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A loss would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is less than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Loss included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInContinuingOperati.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInContinuingOperati.description: The increase (decrease) in cash associated with the entity's continuing operating, investing, and financing activities. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a debit balance consistent with its label.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NoncashMergerRelatedCosts.label: Noncash Merger Related Costs
NoncashMergerRelatedCosts.description: Amount of expense (income) related to the increase (decrease) in reserve for business combination costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, and other costs incurred to consummate the merger.

NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilities.label: Noninterest-bearing Deposit Liabilities
NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilities.description: The aggregate amount of all domestic and foreign noninterest-bearing deposits liabilities held by the entity.

NoninterestBearingDomesticDepositCheckin.label: Noninterest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Checking
NoninterestBearingDomesticDepositCheckin.description: Amount of noninterest-bearing domestic checking deposit liabilities.

NoninterestExpense.label: Noninterest Expense
NoninterestExpense.description: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.

NoninterestExpenseOfferingCost.label: Noninterest Expense Offering Cost
NoninterestExpenseOfferingCost.description: Includes offering costs of open-end investment companies, and closed-end funds with a continuous offering period.

NoninterestIncome.label: Noninterest Income
NoninterestIncome.description: The total amount of noninterest income which may be derived from: (1) fees and commissions; (2) premiums earned; (3) insurance policy charges; (4) the sale or disposal of assets; and (5) other sources not otherwise specified.

NoninterestIncomeOther.label: Noninterest Income, Other
NoninterestIncomeOther.description: Represents the total of noninterest income derived from certain activities and assets including (for example): (1) venture capital investments; (2) bank owned life insurance; (3) foreign currency transactions; and (4) mortgage servicing rights.

NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.label: Noninterest Income, Other Operating Income
NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.

OccupancyNet.label: Occupancy, Net
OccupancyNet.description: Amount of net occupancy expense that may include items, such as depreciation of facilities and equipment, lease expenses, property taxes and property and casualty insurance expense.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Net
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OperatingLossCarryforwardsValuationAllow.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards, Valuation Allowance
OperatingLossCarryforwardsValuationAllow.description: The portion of the valuation allowance pertaining to the deferred tax asset representing potential future taxable deductions from net operating loss carryforwards for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities, Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherNoninterestExpense.label: Other Noninterest Expense
OtherNoninterestExpense.description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.

PaymentsForHedgeFinancingActivities.label: Payments for Hedge, Financing Activities
PaymentsForHedgeFinancingActivities.description: The cash outflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either cash flow hedge, fair value hedge or hedge of net investment in foreign operations.

PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.label: Payments for Origination of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.description: The amount of cash paid for the origination of mortgages that are held for sale.

PaymentsForProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBa.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
PaymentsForProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBa.description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) from acquisition (sale) of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) stock.

PaymentsForProceedsFromHedgeFinancingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Hedge, Financing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromHedgeFinancingAct.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either cash flow hedge, fair value hedge or hedge of net investment in foreign operations.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans and Leases
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period of loan and lease balances which are not originated or purchased specifically for resale. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

PaymentsForPurchaseOfSecuritiesOperating.label: Payments for Purchase of Securities, Operating Activities
PaymentsForPurchaseOfSecuritiesOperating.description: Cash paid to purchase debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Payment to Acquire Life Insurance Policy, Investing Activities
PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing loans held for investment purposes during the period.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToSuppliersAndEmployees.label: Payments to Suppliers and Employees
PaymentsToSuppliersAndEmployees.description: Cash payments to suppliers for goods and services provided and to employees for services provided.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Checking
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic checking demand deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Money Market
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Savings
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic savings deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Time Deposits
PercentageOfInterestBearingDomesticDepos.description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic time deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparately.label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Securities
PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparately.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to another party to serve as collateral to partially or fully secure a debt obligation, repurchase agreement or other current or potential obligation, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

ProceedsFromFeesReceived.label: Proceeds from Fees Received
ProceedsFromFeesReceived.description: Cash received for fees during the current period. This element excludes cash proceeds from license fees.

ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.label: Proceeds from Income Tax Refunds
ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

ProceedsFromInterestReceived.label: Proceeds from Interest Received
ProceedsFromInterestReceived.description: Interest received on loans and other debt instruments during the current period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.label: Proceeds, Issuance of Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Including Option Exercised
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, option exercised.

ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Proceeds from Life Insurance Policy
ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.label: Proceeds from Loan and Lease Originations and Principal Collections
ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.description: Cash inflow related to a loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property), lease origination, and principal collections.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Short-term Investments
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: The cash inflow from maturities, prepayments, calls and collections of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForInInterestBearing.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) in Interest-bearing Deposits in Banks
ProceedsFromPaymentsForInInterestBearing.description: The net cash inflow or outflow in Interest-bearing Deposits by banks in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfFederalHomeLoanBankSto.label: Proceeds from Sale of Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
ProceedsFromSaleOfFederalHomeLoanBankSto.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock.

ProceedsFromSaleOfForeclosedAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Foreclosed Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfForeclosedAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale assets received in full or partial satisfaction of a receivable including real and personal property; equity interests in corporations, partnerships, and joint ventures; and beneficial interests in trusts. Foreclosed assets also include loans that are treated as if the underlying collateral had been foreclosed because the institution has taken possession of the collateral, even though legal foreclosure or repossession proceedings have not taken place.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow resulting from the sale of loans classified as held-for-sale, including proceeds from loans sold through mortgage securitization.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherInvestments.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherProductiveAssets.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of tangible or intangible assets used to produce goods or deliver services, classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndE.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndE.description: Amount of cash inflow for the sale of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

ProceedsFromSaleOfShortTermInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Short-term Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfShortTermInvestments.description: The cash inflow from sales of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreT.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
ProceedsFromShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreT.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

ProceedsFromShortTermDebtMaturingInThree.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt, Maturing in Three Months or Less
ProceedsFromShortTermDebtMaturingInThree.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within three months.

ProfessionalAndContractServicesExpense.label: Professional and Contract Services Expense
ProfessionalAndContractServicesExpense.description: Professional and contract service expense includes cost reimbursements for support services related to contracted projects, outsourced management, technical and staff support.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure.label: Real Estate Acquired Through Foreclosure
RealEstateAcquiredThroughForeclosure.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land and buildings obtained through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement.

RealEstateAcquisitionsThroughForeclosure.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Acquisition Through Foreclosure
RealEstateAcquisitionsThroughForeclosure.description: Amount of real estate investments acquired through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Gross
RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.

RelatedPartyDepositLiabilities.label: Related Party Deposit Liabilities
RelatedPartyDepositLiabilities.description: Amount of deposits held by the entity for a related party (entity, shareholder, employee).

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreT.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreT.description: The cash outflow from a repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value at grant date for nonvested equity-based awards issued during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of non-vested equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that validly exist and are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Per share or unit weighted-average fair value of nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the option's term.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures and Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: For presentations that combine terminations, the number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan or that expired.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures and Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price of options that were either forfeited or expired.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average grant-date fair value of options granted during the reporting period as calculated by applying the disclosed option pricing methodology.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Number of Shares

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

ShorttermDebtMaximumAmountOutstandingDur.label: Short-term Debt, Maximum Amount Outstanding During Period
ShorttermDebtMaximumAmountOutstandingDur.description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, the maximum amount borrowed at any time during the period.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeSto.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeSto.description: Number of shares of capital stock issued (purchased by employees) in connection with an employee stock ownership plan.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate value of stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

TangibleCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital, Actual
TangibleCapital.description: Amount of tangible capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequac.label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital, Minimum
TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequac.description: Amount of minimum tangible capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequac.label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequac.description: Ratio of minimum tangible capital to tangible assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TangibleCapitalToTangibleAssets.label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital Ratio, Actual
TangibleCapitalToTangibleAssets.description: Ratio of tangible capital to tangible assets as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Actual
TierOneLeverageCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 leverage capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAssets.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Actual
TierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAssets.description: Ratio of Tier 1 capital to average assets as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Actual
TierOneRiskBasedCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalToRiskWeightedAss.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Actual
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalToRiskWeightedAss.description: Ratio of Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets as defined by regulatory framework.

TierTwoRiskBasedCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier Two Risk-Based Capital, Actual
TierTwoRiskBasedCapital.description: Amount of Tier 2 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, after Year Five
